title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.14 - Use of headlights and horns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.14 - Use of headlights and horns

State Regulations

No person shall drive a vehicle upon the vehicular crossing
using high-beam headlights. The flashing of headlights or sounding of horns on
the vehicular crossing is prohibited except when such procedures are required
in the interest of safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
